hero_description: Accept ARS payments to CVU and cards. Fast, secure, no hidden fees. Solutions for businesses and freelancers.
block_1_text_1: Accept Visa, MasterCard, and all major Argentinian cards. Instantly receive ARS to your CVU or card. Transparent rates, no hidden fees.
block_1_text_2: Our team of experts is always available to help with integration and payment questions.
block_1_text_3: Integrate once — access all payment tools. Scale your business without limits.
block_1_text_4: Your funds and data are protected by encryption, 3D Secure, and 2FA. Full compliance with Argentinian standards.
block_2_text_1: Instantly receive ARS from any Argentinian bank. Your clients pay to CVU or card, and you get notifications and transparent reporting.
block_2_text_2: Accept online payments for your store or platform. Supports subscriptions, refunds, and chargeback management.
block_3_description: Solutions for growth — from startups to large companies.
block_4_text_1: The client initiates a payment and transfers ARS to your CVU or card. The system instantly detects the incoming funds.
block_4_text_2: Once funds are received, we verify, comply with all requirements, and prepare the payout. Everything is automated.
block_4_text_3: Net funds are credited to your account. You receive notifications and can track all operations in real time.
block_4_text_4: Our technical support team monitors all transactions 24/7 for your security.
block_5_description: Leave a request or write to us on Telegram — we will reply within 5 minutes.
